ValidationRule.description: Shows an error if a user attempts to mark this task as completed but the relevant fields on the LOA have not been completed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Chase_client_for_LOA", ISPICKVAL( Status, "Completed"), OR( ISPICKVAL( Related_LOA__r.Format_of_Signed_LOA__c , ""), ISNULL(Related_LOA__r.Date_LOA_received_from_client__c), ISPICKVAL( Related_LOA__r.Authority_Type__c , ""), ISNULL( Related_LOA__r.Signed_LOA_Link__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You need to add the date the LOA was received from the client, its format and authority type to the LOA before marking this task as complete.
